00016 void MATRIX::ODEtoOGL(const float* p, const float* R)
00017 {
00018   Element[0]  = R[0]; Element[1]  = R[4]; Element[2]  = R[8]; Element[3]  = 0;
00019   Element[4]  = R[1]; Element[5]  = R[5]; Element[6]  = R[9]; Element[7]  = 0;
00020   Element[8]  = R[2]; Element[9]  = R[6]; Element[10] = R[10];Element[11] = 0;
00021   Element[12] = p[0]; Element[13] = p[1]; Element[14] = p[2]; Element[15] = 1;
00022 }

00025 {

00027     Element[1] = 0.0;
00028     Element[2] = 0.0;
00029     Element[3] = 0.0;

00068 {
00069     MATRIX temp;
00070 
00071     temp.CopyMatrix(this->Element);
00072 
00073     Element[0] = temp.Element[0 ] * m[0 ]

00075         + temp.Element[8 ] * m[2 ]

00154 void MATRIX::MatrixInverse()
00155 {
00156     MATRIX temp;
00157 
00158     temp.CopyMatrix(this->Element);
00159 
00160     Element[0 ] = temp.Element[0 ];
00161     Element[1 ] = temp.Element[4 ];
00162     Element[2 ] = temp.Element[8 ];
00163 
00164     Element[4 ] = temp.Element[1 ];
00165     Element[5 ] = temp.Element[5 ];
00166     Element[6 ] = temp.Element[9 ];
00167 
00168     Element[8 ] = temp.Element[2 ];
00169     Element[9 ] = temp.Element[6 ];
00170     Element[10] = temp.Element[10];
00171 
00172     Element[12] *= -1.0f;
00173     Element[13] *= -1.0f;
00174     Element[14] *= -1.0f;
00175 }

00177 void MATRIX::MatrixFromAxisAngle(VECTOR axis, float theta)
00178 {
00179     QUAT q;
00180     float halfTheta = theta * 0.5;
00181     float cosHalfTheta = cos(halfTheta);
00182     float sinHalfTheta = sin(halfTheta);
00183     float xs, ys, zs, wx, wy, wz, xx, xy, xz, yy, yz, zz;
00184     q.x = axis.x * sinHalfTheta;
00185     q.y = axis.y * sinHalfTheta;
00186     q.z = axis.z * sinHalfTheta;
00187     q.w = cosHalfTheta;
00188     xs = q.x * 2;  ys = q.y * 2;  zs = q.z * 2;
00189     wx = q.w * xs; wy = q.w * ys; wz = q.w * zs;
00190     xx = q.x * xs; xy = q.x * ys; xz = q.x * zs;
00191     yy = q.y * ys; yz = q.y * zs; zz = q.z * zs;
00192     Element[0] = 1 - (yy + zz);
00193     Element[1] = xy - wz;
00194     Element[2] = xz + wy;
00195     Element[4] = xy + wz;
00196     Element[5] = 1 - (xx + zz);
00197     Element[6] = yz - wx;
00198     Element[8] = xz - wy;
00199     Element[9] = yz + wx;
00200     Element[10] = 1 - (xx + yy);
00201     Element[12] = Element[13] = Element[14] = Element[3] = Element[7] = Element[11] = 0;
00202     Element[15] = 1;
00203 }
00204 
00205 void MATRIX::QuatToMatrix(QUAT quat)
00206 {
00207     float wx, wy, wz, xx, yy, yz, xy, xz, zz, x2, y2, z2;
00208     x2 = quat.x + quat.x;
00209     y2 = quat.y + quat.y;
00210     z2 = quat.z + quat.z;
00211     xx = quat.x * x2;
00212     xy = quat.x * y2;
00213     xz = quat.x * z2;
00214     yy = quat.y * y2;
00215     yz = quat.y * z2;
00216     zz = quat.z * z2;
00217     wx = quat.w * x2;
00218     wy = quat.w * y2;
00219     wz = quat.w * z2;
00220     Element[0] = 1.0 - (yy + zz);
00221     Element[1] = xy - wz;
00222     Element[2] = xz + wy;
00223     Element[3] = 0.0;
00224     Element[4] = xy + wz;
00225     Element[5] = 1.0 - (xx + zz);
00226     Element[6] = yz - wx;
00227     Element[7] = 0.0;
00228     Element[8] = xz - wy;
00229     Element[9] = yz + wx;
00230     Element[10] = 1.0 - (xx + yy);
00231     Element[11] = 0.0;
00232     Element[12] = 0;
00233     Element[13] = 0;
00234     Element[14] = 0;
00235     Element[15] = 1;
00236 }
